thread.title: Thaman receives rave reviews for Bruce Lee
thread.title_full: Thaman receives rave reviews for Bruce Lee - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Thaman receives rave reviews for Bruce Lee
text: It's celebration time for Thaman as the music of Bruce Lee is being loved by one and all. Thaman's peppy music score is one of the strongest points of Bruce Lee. Thaman completed the re-recording of the film in just nine days and the output was just outstanding. The background score has won a lot of hearts and the one scored for mega star's entry is creating a superb buzz. The ace musician worked night and day to give a the film a rocking effect. Rakul Preet is the female lead and S S Thaman scores music. D V V Danayya is the producer. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
